description.short: Node.js Bot w/ LUIS, QnAMaker, and ServiceNow Incident management.
description.full: "Demo Microsoft Teams Node.js Bot that leverages LUIS and QnAMaker Microsoft Cognitive Services as well as make calls to a ServiceNow Instance API for basic ServiceNow Incident management.

commands.title: Get Incidents
commands.description: Tells Mr. Meeseeks to retrieve your most recent unresolved ServiceNow Incidents with links to the Incidents.

commands.title: Create Incident
commands.description: Starts the "/createIncident" dialog and assists you with creating a new ServiceNow Incident from within Microsoft Teams

commands.title: Search for a Knowledge Article
commands.description: Starts the "/searchKnowledgeBase" dialog and submits a search query to ServiceNow,

commands.title: Update Incident
commands.description: Starts the "/updateIncident" dialog and assists with updating an Incident in ServiceNow.

commands.title: Resolve Incident
commands.description: Starts the "/resolveIncident" dialog and assists with setting an unresolved Incident to Resolved in ServiceNow
